landingTextTitle: Hi, I'm Daniel and I'm a
landingTextMsg: I'm a full-stack software engineer based in Abuja, Nigeria, with over 7 years of development experience. For the past 4+ years, I have dedicated myself to designing and building high-quality software solutions for both web and mobile platforms. With over 2 years of hands-on experience in DevOps my approach is holistic. I am committed to delivering exceptional technological experiences from inception to deployment. i am open for new opportunities and interesting projects.
resumeMsg: My journey so far as a software engineer, specializing in full-stack software development started in school. The following years saw me develop my skills in web development. After school i progressed with me developing my skills as a software engineer, focusing on networking, software development, DevOps and space technology engineering.
